title: Карпатський рейнджер
overview: The land of his ancestors is plagued by crime. Honest, brave and caring Paul Hordiichak knows what needs to be done to help the spread of theft. 2 + 2 presents a new Ukrainian detective series called "Carpathian Ranger".The main character of the series is a canadian of Ukrainian origin, Paul Hordiichak, who arrives in the land of Western Ukraine. He is an instructor of the program "Ukrainian Sheriff", but he was not going to stay long in the homeland of his ancestors. However, it did not happen as expected and faced with the evil in the face of the killer, he chooses the path of the hero. He must clear this Holy land of all sorts of villains and make the land safe. Especially since Stepan is a loyal partner at your side. Will Paul be able to beat crime?
